mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.goods_id AS "goodsId", a.image_url AS "imageUrl", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks"
